original: @84a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @84a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam /
translated: Ārya-Mañjuśrī-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: The Means of Attaining the Noble Mañjuśrī

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: tshad med pa dang byang chub sems bskyed de //
analyzed: tshad med pa dang byang chub sems bskyed de //
translated: Having generated immeasurable [love, compassion, and so forth] and bodhicitta,

original: sngags 'di brjod cing mi dmigs stong par bsgom /
analyzed: sngags 'di brjod cing mi dmigs stong par bsgom /
translated: Recite this mantra and meditate on emptiness, non-apprehension:

original: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha: sarba dharmma:sva bh'a ba bi shuddhonya\ ham /
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha: sarba dharmma:sva bh'a ba bi shuddhonya\ ham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva-viśuddhaḥ sarvadharmaḥ svabhāva-viśuddho'haṃ.

original: stong nying ngang las bam pam aa dkar las //
analyzed: stong nying ngang las bam pam aa dkar las //
translated: From the state of emptiness, from bhrūṃ and paṃ comes a white a.

original: rgya mtsho'i steng du padma zla ba bsam //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i steng du padma zla ba bsam //
translated: On the ocean, visualize a lotus and moon.

original: de steng rang sems aa dkar nyid gyur las //
analyzed: de steng rang sems aa dkar nyid gyur las //
translated: Upon that, one's mind becomes a white a,

original: 'od 'phros don byas 'dus par ltar gyur te //
analyzed: 'od 'phros don byas 'dus par ltar gyur te //
translated: Which emits light, performs benefits, and returns to gather.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin autpal bsnams//
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin autpal bsnams//
translated: It becomes Mañjuśrī, with one face, two arms, boon-granting mudrā, and utpala flower.

original: rdo rje'i skyil krung 'od zer rab 'phro ba //
analyzed: rdo rje'i skyil krung 'od zer rab 'phro ba //
translated: In vajra posture, radiating light rays,

original: dar dkar na bza' rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: dar dkar na bza' rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
translated: Wearing white silk and adorned with precious ornaments,

original: ston zla'i mdog can lang tsho ldan pa bsgom //
analyzed: ston zla'i mdog can lang tsho ldan pa bsgom //
translated: The color of the autumn moon, youthful.

original: aom b'a kyee dam na ma:rig sngags rgyal po 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub //
analyzed: aom b'a kyee dam na ma:rig sngags rgyal po 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub //
translated: One will become a vidyādhara with a hundred thousand recitations of the king of mantras.

original: zla ba gcig gis blo 'phel rig pa 'dzin //
analyzed: zla ba gcig gis blo 'phel rig pa 'dzin //
translated: One’s intelligence will increase in a month.

original: dngos sam rmi lam nyid du mthong thos 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos sam rmi lam nyid du mthong thos 'gyur //
translated: One will see or hear in actuality or in a dream.

original: grub pa'i mtshan ma gzhan yang snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtshan ma gzhan yang snang bar 'gyur //
translated: Other signs of accomplishment will also appear.

original: nyi zla gzas zin dus su ma sha nyid //
analyzed: nyi zla gzas zin dus su ma sha nyid //
translated: At the time of an eclipse of the sun or moon,

original: dar dkar gyis dril lce 'og bcug la bzlas //
analyzed: dar dkar gyis dril lce 'og bcug la bzlas //
translated: wrap a piece of meat in white silk, place it under one’s tongue, and recite.

original: myu gu byung gyur 'di ni grub pa yin //
analyzed: myu gu byung gyur 'di ni grub pa yin //
translated: If a sprout appears, this is a sign of accomplishment.

original: yang na ral gri nyid bzung rig 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na ral gri nyid bzung rig 'dzin 'gyur //
translated: Alternatively, by holding a sword, one will become a vidyādhara.

original: gre phugs aa dkar dag las 'od 'phros pas//
analyzed: gre phugs aa dkar dag las 'od 'phros pas//
translated: Light radiates from the pure white a in the uvula

original: @84b rgyal ba kun gyi blo gros dpag med dag /'dus nas khong du thim pas lus kun khengs //
analyzed: @84b rgyal ba kun gyi blo gros dpag med dag /'dus nas khong du thim pas lus kun khengs //
translated: and the immeasurable intelligence of all the buddhas gathers and dissolves into it, filling one’s entire body.

original: mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the dhāraṇī of undiminishing memory.

original: snying dbus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs drug la //
analyzed: snying dbus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs drug la //
translated: In the center of the heart is a six-spoked moon maṇḍala.

original: 'bru drug yi ge bkod la g-yas g-yon bskor //
analyzed: 'bru drug yi ge bkod la g-yas g-yon bskor //
translated: Arrange the six seed syllables on the spokes, circling to the right and left.

original: shugs drag rtse mo rno zhing rab dkar bas //
analyzed: shugs drag rtse mo rno zhing rab dkar bas //
translated: They are sharp, white, and very powerful.

original: nyes 'joms stobs ldan myur 'dzin rab gsal 'gyur //
analyzed: nyes 'joms stobs ldan myur 'dzin rab gsal 'gyur //
translated: The powerful one who destroys faults, the swift one, the clear one, the one who transforms.

original: pha rol phyin dang bstod pa mang po dang // mtshan nas brjod dang mchod pa sna tshogs dang / mandal dbul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya //
analyzed: pha rol phyin dang bstod pa mang po dang // mtshan nas brjod dang mchod pa sna tshogs dang / mandal dbul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya //
translated: The perfections, the many praises, the various recitations of names, the various offerings, the mandala offerings, and the supplications.

original: 'di ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: 'di ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: This is the way to quickly accomplish.

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i pandi ta chen po ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i pandi ta chen po ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition by the great pandita Mati, blessed by Manjushri, is complete.

original: shin gar shar phyogs dza ga t'a la'i pandi ta chen po d'a na sh'i las bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i rir lha'i skad las bod kyi brdar 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: shin gar shar phyogs dza ga t'a la'i pandi ta chen po d'a na sh'i las bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i rir lha'i skad las bod kyi brdar 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the great pandita Dana Shlla from Jagaddala in the east, it was translated without error from the divine language into the language of Tibet at the center of Tibet, on the mountain of the rakshasa sage.
